title: Determine the Type of Intermolecular Force
text: Consider the types of intermolecular forces: London dispersion, dipole-dipole, and hydrogen bonding. Which one is applicable to nonpolar molecules?

title: Nonpolar Molecules
text: Nonpolar molecules primarily exhibit London dispersion forces. These forces are present in all molecules but are the only forces in nonpolar molecules.

title: Analyze the Structure
text: The molecule shown is a hydrocarbon with no polar bonds or hydrogen bonding capability. What does this imply about its intermolecular forces?

title: Conclusion
text: Based on the analysis, determine the predominant intermolecular force in the given molecule.
